attributes.action: Ensure that any MP who has cheated the tax-payer by claiming expenses that they have had to repay, resign immediately and not wait till the next General Election in order to get a Golden Handshake.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A member of the general public who claimed expenses  that in effect is fraud - would face instant dismissal by an employer and most likely be prosecuted. The same rule should apply to Members of Parliament

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
